CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 28, 2010

[Cite as 05/28/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-2368.]

MEDIATION REFERRALS

2010-0847. Ridgewood Rd. Properties, L.L.C. v. Summit Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2007-A-1406.

The following cases have been referred to mediation pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 17.1:
